correctness.rationale: Severe schema and factual issues. While a few values match the article (ALD method = TALD is plausible; O3 as oxidant; IGZO film thickness 6 nm; deposition temperature 250 °C; SS ≈ 86 mV/dec), most fields are missing, incorrect, or violate the schema. Key problems: (1) Schema violations due to nulls: many quantityValue.numericValue fields are null where numbers are required (processParameters.pressure, thicknessControl.growthPerCycle.values[].value, thicknessControl.numberofCycles, nucleationPeriod, supercycleDesign.numberofSubcycles[].count, multiple materialProperties metrics, deviceProperties fields, plasmaPower set to null though object type is required if present). (2) Incorrect/unsourced values: deviceProperties.thresholdVoltage set to −1.0 V (article reports ~ −0.06 V average for 8 nm interlayer; other thicknesses −0.02 to −0.07 V); saturation set to False without support; otherAspects.filmStability and reproducibility set to False without evidence. (3) Reactant mapping/coherence issues: coReactant is given for compound “IGZO” instead of per subcomponent (In2O3, Ga2O3, ZnO) as implied by supercycle-based IGZO ALD; precursors are “Not Found” with compounds labeled as In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO but no actual precursors from the article (none are reported). (4) Required process details absent or placeholder-only: carrierGas, purgingGas, substrate, pressure, dosing/purge times, flow rates, supercycle counts/sequence are missing, generic, or placeholder values not traceable to the text. (5) Multiple processes not extracted: the article describes ALD of IZO interlayer, IGZO channel, HfOx GI, and IZO gate; only a single IGZO process was provided. Corrections needed: remove nulls or supply valid numeric values with QUDT units; correct Vth to the reported value(s); map coReactant as O3 for each subcomponent; either supply or omit optional fields rather than using unsupported placeholders; populate only fields traceable to the article; and add separate ALD process instances for IZO interlayer, HfOx, and IZO gate if extracted.

completeness.rationale: Several required ALD fields are missing or contain invalid placeholders, and one key device metric is incorrect. Positives: IGZO ALD temperature (250 °C), oxidant (O3), and IGZO film thickness (6 nm) match the article; SS = 86 mV/dec is correct. Major gaps/errors: (1) Reactants: No precursors are reported for In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO sub-cycles; carrier and purging gases are missing, though the schema requires them. (2) Process parameters: Reactor, substrate, delivery method, and especially pressure have invalid values (pressure numericValue = null violates the schema). Growth-per-cycle value and number of cycles are null; dosingTime, purgeTime, and flowRates are empty arrays (schema expects populated entries). Nucleation period is null and saturation is set to false without support from the article. (3) Supercycle design: Subcycle counts are null and the In2O3→Ga2O3→ZnO sequence is asserted without textual support; the article does not specify an IGZO supercycle recipe. (4) Material properties: Crystallinity is not set to amorphous despite the article stating a-IGZO; conformality/uniformity and composition lack quantitative values even though EDS/TEM confirm uniform coverage qualitatively. (5) Device properties: Threshold voltage is wrong (set to −1.0 V vs. about −0.06 V for 8 nm interlayer); device structure (vertical CAA with recessed S/D) is omitted; on/off ratio and field-effect mobility are missing. (6) Other aspects: Film stability and reproducibility are set to false without evidence. Scope note: The article also ALD-deposits an IZO interlayer (3–8 nm), HfOx (10 nm), and an IZO gate (20 nm). If multiple ALD processes are in scope, separate process objects should be added for these films. Properties to add/review: precursors, carrier/purging gases, pressure, dosing/purge/flow parameters, growth-per-cycle and cycle count, supercycle details only if reported, set crystallinity to amorphous, correct Vth (~−0.06 V for 8 nm IZO interlayer), and add device structure; avoid nulls/unsupported booleans.
